New Records: Jason Holder finished with the rare figures of 3.4-18-7-4
Key Match Events: England was dismissed for 103 in 19.4 overs
Jason Holder sent back four batsmen for seven runs
Brandon King hit a confident half-century
Shai Hope was dismissed by Adil Rashid for 20
Pre-Game Insights: England completely dominated the last series in the Caribbean in March 2019, winning by four wickets, 137 runs and eight wickets
Post-Match Reflections: Eoin Morgan focused on what lies ahead, stating that 'trying to get our minds around risk-reward, was a challenge but we hope to play better cricket tomorrow, Wednesday and next weekend'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kieron Pollard praised the clinical display of his team, stating that the batsmen noticed that 'the wicket was not conducive to stroke play' and made the required adjustment
